item.title: AMS album of the week - Warpaint
item.author: mto11,
item.description: Warpaint, the eponymous follow-up to 2010’s well-received debut, The Fool, offers a different manifestation of the LA foursome’s brand of delicate rock music. It smacks of the same cohesion which _The Fool _was noted for, however, whereas The Fool was generally characterised by a restless streak, …
